item.text: Now after the Sabbath, at dawn on the first day of the week, Mary Magdalene and the other Mary went to look at the tomb.

<st data-num="2400" class="">Suddenly</st> there <st data-num="1096" class="">was</st> a <st data-num="3173" class="">severe</st> <st data-num="4578" class="">earthquake</st>, <st data-num="1063" class="">for</st> an <st data-num="32" class="">angel</st> of the <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2597" class="">descending</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> <st data-num="3772" class="">heaven</st> <st data-num="4334" class="">came</st> and <st data-num="617">rolled away</st> the <st data-num="3037" class="">stone</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2521" class="">sat</st> <st data-num="1883" class="">on</st> <st data-num="846" class="">it</st>.

<st data-num="846" class="">His</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2397" class="">appearance</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">was</st> <st data-num="5613" class="">like</st> <st data-num="796" class="">lightning</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="1742" class="">clothes</st> were <st data-num="3022" class="">white</st> <st data-num="5613" class="">as</st> <st data-num="5510" class="">snow</st>.

The<n id="1" /> <st data-num="5083">guards</st> were <st data-num="4579" class="">shaken</st> and <st data-num="1096" class="">became</st> <st data-num="5613" class="">like</st> <st data-num="3498">dead men</st> because they were so <st data-num="5401" class="">afraid</st> of <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> the <st data-num="32" class="">angel</st> <st data-num="3004">said</st><n id="1" /> to the <st data-num="1135" class="">women</st>, “Do <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> be <st data-num="5399" class="">afraid;</st> I <st data-num="1492" class="">know</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> you are <st data-num="2212">looking for</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st>, who was <st data-num="4717" class="">crucified</st>.<n id="3" />

He <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="5602" class="">here</st>, <st data-num="1063" class="">for</st> he has been <st data-num="1453" class="">raised</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2531">just as</st> he <st data-num="3004">said</st>. <st data-num="1205" class="">Come</st> and <st data-num="1492" class="">see</st> the <st data-num="5117" class="">place</st> <st data-num="3699" class="">where</st> he<n id="2" /> was <st data-num="2749" class="">lying</st>.

<st data-num="2532" class="">Then</st> <st data-num="4198" class="">go</st> <st data-num="5035" class="">quickly</st> and <st data-num="2036" class="">tell</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="3101" class="">disciples</st>, ‘He has been <st data-num="1453" class="">raised</st> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="3498" class="">dead</st>. He<n id="1" /> is <st data-num="4254">going ahead</st> of <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> <st data-num="1056" class="">Galilee</st>. You will <st data-num="3700" class="">see</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="1563" class="">there.’</st> <st data-num="2400" class="">Listen</st>, I have <st data-num="3004">told</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>!”

<st data-num="2532" class="">So</st><n id="1" /> they <st data-num="565" class="">left</st> the <st data-num="3419" class="">tomb</st> <st data-num="5035" class="">quickly</st>, <st data-num="3326" class="">with</st> <st data-num="5401" class="">fear</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3173" class="">great</st> <st data-num="5479" class="">joy</st>, and <st data-num="5143" class="">ran</st> to <st data-num="518" class="">tell</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="3101" class="">disciples</st>.

<st data-num="2532" class="">But</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="5221" class="">met</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, <st data-num="3004" class="">saying</st>, “<st data-num="5463">Greetings</st>!” They<n id="2" /> <st data-num="4334" class="">came</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, <st data-num="2902">held on</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="4228" class="">feet</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4352" class="">worshiped</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>.
Then Jesus said to them, “Do not be afraid. Go and tell my brothers to go to Galilee. They will see me there.”
While they were going, some of the guards went into the city and told the chief priests everything that had happened.

After<n id="1" /> they had <st data-num="4863" class="">assembled</st> <st data-num="3326" class="">with</st> the <st data-num="4245" class="">elders</st> and <st data-num="2983" class="">formed</st> a <st data-num="4824" class="">plan</st>, they <st data-num="1325" class="">gave</st> a <st data-num="2425" class="">large sum</st> of <st data-num="694" class="">money</st> to the <st data-num="4757" class="">soldiers</st>,

<st data-num="3004" class="">telling</st> them, “You are to <st data-num="3004">say</st>, ‘<st data-num="846" class="">His</st> <st data-num="3101" class="">disciples</st> <st data-num="2064" class="">came</st> at <st data-num="3571" class="">night</st> and <st data-num="2813" class="">stole</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his body</st><n id="1" /> while <st data-num="1473" class="">we</st> were <st data-num="2837" class="">asleep.’</st>

<st data-num="1437" class="">If</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> matter is <st data-num="191" class="">heard</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">before</st> the <st data-num="2232" class="">governor</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="1473" class="">we</st> will <st data-num="3982" class="">satisfy</st> him<n id="3" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4160" class="">keep</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="275">out of trouble</st>.”<n id="4" />
So they took the money and did as they were instructed. And this story is told among the Jews to this day.
So the 11 disciples went to Galilee to the mountain Jesus had designated.

When<n id="1" /> they <st data-num="1492" class="">saw</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, they <st data-num="4352" class="">worshiped</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> <st data-num="3588">some</st> <st data-num="1365" class="">doubted</st>.<n id="3" />

<st data-num="2532" class="">Then</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="4334">came up</st> and <st data-num="2980" class="">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>,<n id="1" /> “<st data-num="3956">All</st> <st data-num="1849" class="">authority</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="3772" class="">heaven</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> <st data-num="1093" class="">earth</st> has been <st data-num="1325" class="">given</st> to <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>.

<st data-num="3767" class="">Therefore</st> <st data-num="4198" class="">go</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3100">make disciples</st> of <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> <st data-num="1484" class="">nations</st>, <st data-num="907" class="">baptizing</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="3686" class="">name</st> of the <st data-num="3962" class="">Father</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="5207" class="">Son</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="40" class="">Holy</st> <st data-num="4151" class="">Spirit</st>,<n id="2" />
teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And remember, I am with you always, to the end of the age.”
